info.name: GitHub 98
info.description: If GitHub were an operating system around the year '98, it would probably look like this. Inspired by Microsoft purchasing GitHub. This theme was based on a design by twitter user @nikitonsky, who upon learning Microsoft was buying GitHub, created a mockup of a Windows 98 theme. origin: So I heard $MSFT is buying @GitHub With his permission, I've tried my best to implement his mockups, because I kinda want my github like this too. Please send any issues you have with the theme to my GitHub repository for it https://github.com/AtomicBlom/github98/issues
info.additionalInfo:
v 1.0
Initial release. Site is mostly functional, but needs a lot of love still on the user profile page, wiki, projects, settings and possibly more.
